title: Knight gaming pre made teams tournament tonight!
body:
Knight Gaming is hosting a Pre-made team tournament tonight!
Create a team on the battlefy and sign up to play in the tournament!
This is the link to the discord: https://discord.gg/MA8mwbr 
The link is set to never expire but if it does expire the discord link will also be on the battlefy page when you register.

https://battlefy.com/knight-gaming-tournaments/knight-gaming-weekly-3312017-premade-teams/58dd38d4a19bea320321d30a/info?infoTab=details

replies.body: r u down to play a low dia team? add me in game it's not my team i just coordinate it.
